name: RTCPeerConnection.addStream
description: The obsolete RTCPeerConnection method addStream() adds a MediaStream as a local source of audio or video. Instead of using this obsolete method, you should instead use addTrack() once for each track you wish to send to the remote peer.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCPeerConnection.addStream()' in WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers.
